net.stemkoski.bagel

Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.stemkoski.bagel.Audio

  • public class Audio
extends java.lang.Object
    Load an audio file (sound or music).

    Sound files are typically small, short audio files that are played when discrete game events occur (such as when an item is collected, or when two objects collide). Sound files are completely loaded into memory.

    Music files are typically large, long audio files containing background music that is played continuously during the game. Music files are streamed from a file as they are played.
